course_title: Interpretation of The Old Testament I
class_notes: (THIS CLASS IS FULL; contact candlerregistrar@emory.edu to be placed on the waiting list) (ONLINE; synchronous live sessions Wednesdays 3pm-5pm; remaining contact time fulfilled via online asynchronous engagement) synchronous live sessions Wednesdays 3-5pm; remaining contact time fulfilled via online asynchronous engagement; open to new students beginning in Spring 2022 and, as space permits others who have delayed the OT sequence or needed to withdraw from OT 501 in Fall 2021)
course_description: Introduction to the Pentateuch and Former Prophets, with attention to the history and cultural context of ancient Israel and to the interpretation of Old Testament prose literature.
